sentences.cn: 一座历史上有名的矿泉城镇

sentences.en: Bath in Britain is Eruope's famous spa town.
sentences.cn: 英国的巴思是欧洲著名的矿泉疗养地.

sentences.en: CHI SPA, a sanctuary of tranquillity.
sentences.cn: “气”Spa, 仿若是远离凡尘俗世的避风港.

sentences.en: Here is a image of well call the SPA basin.
sentences.cn: 这里是一些图片,我们叫它SPA盆地.

sentences.en: Other popular additions include swimming pools with sliding roofs, party rooms and spa facilities.
sentences.cn: 还有其它受欢迎的新增元素包括滑顶游泳池 、 派对房及SPA设施.

sentences.en: Please take a moment to enjoy our Spa herbal tea before treatment.
sentences.cn: 请在护理项目之前饮用我们特备的SPA草药茶.

sentences.en: Postoperative complications of SPA group were lower than those in CPA group ( P < 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: SPA组术后并发症发生率低于CPA组 ( P<0.05 ).

sentences.en: Spa water is thought to be very good for health.
sentences.cn: 人们认为矿泉水对健康有益.

sentences.en: Staphylococcal protein A ( SPA ) has an unique property of combining with the Fc fragment of IgG.
sentences.cn: 葡萄菌球A蛋白 ( SPA ) 能特异性地结合IgG分子 的Fc片段而不影响IgG抗体对抗原的反应.

sentences.en: The frequent spa - goer can find his own retreat after everyday hectic work.
sentences.cn: 频繁的Spa用品使他在每天狂热的工作后找到逃避的感觉.

sentences.en: The hotel's new Spa offers every kind of rejuvenating treatment and therapy.
sentences.cn: 这个酒店新的温泉疗养区提供各种养生护理和诊疗服务。

sentences.en: The polysaccharide SPA was isolated and purified from Ganoderma tsugae.
sentences.cn: SPA是从松杉灵芝中分离纯化出的一种新多糖.

sentences.en: The spa - like bathroom is a work of art.
sentences.cn: 像Spa的浴室是一项艺术工作.
休闲健身中心晚上9点关门。

sentences.en: The spa has 6 indoor pools, 2 for women only, 2 for men only, and 2 for mixed bathing.
sentences.cn: 这个温泉有6个室内池子，其中2个仅供女士，2个仅供男士，其余2个可以男女共用。

sentences.en: The spa is the last word in luxury and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 这家矿泉疗养浴场极尽奢华，功效极高。

words.tran_cn: 矿泉；温泉浴场；矿泉治疗地

trans.tran_cn: 休闲健身中心，矿泉疗养地，矿泉城
trans.tran_en: a place where the water has special minerals in it, and where people go to improve their health by drinking the water or swimming in it
